## Procedures.IParameterModel interface

A data model for a procedure.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IParameterModel 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getId()](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.getid.md) | <p>Returns the unique language-neutral ID for the parameter.</p><p>This represents the identify of the variable model which does not change over time.</p> |
|  [getName()](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.getname.md) | Returns the name of this parameter. |
|  [getTypes()](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.gettypes.md) | Return the types of this parameter. |
|  [saveState()](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.savestate.md) | Serializes the state of the parameter to JSON. |
|  [setName(name)](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.setname.md) | Sets the name of this parameter to the given name. |
|  [setProcedureModel(model)](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.setproceduremodel.md) | Sets the procedure model this parameter is associated with. |
|  [setTypes(types)](./blockly.procedures.iparametermodel.settypes.md) | Sets the types of this parameter to the given type. |
